nodes.name: createPrizeTable
createTournament

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to enter a tournament by paying the listed entry fee
@param id unique ID of the tournament
nodes.name: enterTournament
completeTournament
claimTournamentPrize
claimTournamentRefund
createPrizeTable
createTournament

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to enter a tournament by paying the listed entry fee
@param id unique ID of the tournament
nodes.name: enterTournament
completeTournament
claimTournamentPrize
claimTournamentRefund

params.index: final standing index in the tournaments' final standings

claimTournamentPrize(bytes32,uint256).return: whether the tournament prize was claimed

params.index: entry index in the tournaments' entries

claimTournamentRefund(bytes32,uint256).return: whether the tournament entry fee was refunded

params.finalStandings: final standings of participants in the tournament
params.uniqueFinalStandings: Number of unique positions in the final standing array

params.table: array of integers representing redeemable prize money for each position represented by indices in the array

createPrizeTable(uint256[]).return: unique ID of the prize table

params.entryLimit: Entry limit for each unique address
params.maxEntries: the maximum number of entries for the tournament
params.minEntries: the minimum number of entries for the tournament
params.prizeTable: unique ID of prize table to be used for the tournament
params.rakePercent: percentage of the prize pool retained by Decent.bet

createTournament(uint256,uint256,uint256.return: unique ID of the created tournament

claimTournamentPrize(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allows users to claim their tournament prizes

claimTournamentRefund(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allows users to claim refunds for tournaments

completeTournament(bytes32,uint256[],uin.notice: Allows the admin to complete the tournament by publishing the final standings

createPrizeTable(uint256[]).notice: Creates a prize table that can be used for a tournament

createTournament(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Creates a tournament that users can enter

enterTournament(bytes32).notice: Allows users to enter a tournament by paying the listed entry fee
